text: Eka nowachona niya, â€œUdi mane ni yo nyandwat gi yo milambo mochomo laru mar hekalu ne gin ute jodolo, kama jodolo mabiro e nyim Jehova Nyasaye biro chame chiwo maler mogik. Kanyo ema gibiro ketoe chiwo maler mogik, ma gin chiwo mag cham, misengini mag golo richo kod chiwo mipwodhogo chunje ma bura oloyo, nikech kanyo en kama ler.
